Bono: s statement about the United States being "about half as what European countries give as a percentage" was fact-checked.
The fact: checking revealed that while the United States distributes more in foreign aid than any other country in terms of total amount, when considered as a percentage of gross national income, the United States ranks lower compared to European countries.
The organization ONE: co-founded by Bono, confirmed that Bono was referring to foreign aid in general when making the claim.
